get.description: Return server metrics in Prometheus format, using Starlette Exporter

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Map of target and source columns with type of direct interaction

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: List source columns with type of indirect interaction

types.title: Types
types.description: Type of relation between source and target column

last_used_at.title: Last Used At
last_used_at.description: Last time when transformation was used at

total_datasets.title: Total Datasets
total_datasets.description: Total number of datasets bound to this location

total_jobs.title: Total Jobs
total_jobs.description: Total number of jobs bound to this location

type.title: Type
type.description: Location type, e.g kafka, hdfs, postgres

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: External ID for integration with other systems

NotAuthorizedRedirectSchema.title: NotAuthorizedRedirectSchema
NotAuthorizedRedirectSchema.description:
The reason of using UNAUTHORIZED instead of strict redirect is:
Fronted is using `fetch()` function which can't handle redirect responses
https://github.com/whatwg/fetch/issues/601

position.title: Position
position.description: Sequentinal position of operation within the run, e.g. Spark jobId

pages_count.title: Pages Count
pages_count.description: Number of items returned in current page

job_id.title: Job Id
job_id.description: Job the run is associated with

persistent_log_url.title: Persistent Log Url
persistent_log_url.description: Persistent log url of the run, like Spark history server url, optional

running_log_url.title: Running Log Url
running_log_url.description: Log url of the run in progress, like Spark session UI url, optional

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: External ID for integration with other systems
